game.name: Zombies at the Beach
game.description:
The huge world of free online zombie games always excites and leaves players wanting more! Today we have also tried to bring you a brand new action packed challenge that you would like to play in your gaming device again and again. Whether you search for war games for PC or seek the graphically-improved free fighting games for mobile phones, Zombies at the Beach will surely be enough to satisfy your appetite for the high-quality action based games. Join us today to explore this deadly world together!

No one has brought you at the beach to enjoy your vacation under the sun during the winter season. The bad thing about this place is that is invaded by a horde of famished zombies who look quite excited to raid the free buffet. They are in a mood of not leaving it for the multiple tourists who are also available at the beach with you. Being inspired from a very bad movie, you carry your own weapon in your hands. What are you waiting for, now? Use your shotgun to eliminate the area from these bloodthirsty zombies!

Remember it is your responsibility to clean the beach and make that place better for the cute and pretty ladies. May be anyone out of these beautiful girls get impressed by you and invite you date with her after winning the battle in this one of the top html5 shooter games. There is no need to show sympathy for anyone as they will hit you hard and do not take a single minute to throw you out of the game. Check out more free games on atmegame.com and fight off scary zombies in a cool environment!
